name: The Survival Kit for iOS Design in Figma - iOS 15
description:
Learn the fundamentals of Apple Human Interface Guidelines with this survival kit. Design not only beautiful iOS apps for iPhone, but also usable, code-friendly UIs ready for production.


This is a free learning guide to help you to start your UI Design for iOS 15 apps and save you (and your programmer) a lot of time. Learn about:

- Apple's Human Interface Guidelines for iOS

- iPhone screen resolutions

- SF & NY typography

- SF Symbols (iOS icons)

- System Colors (light, dark and accessible)

- iOS Components

- Prototyping
